meta.description: Rigorous definitions for statistical measures in geometric and degraded contexts
meta.semantic_constraint: ALL operations must be Manifold-Native. No Euclidean fallbacks.

blueprint.mechanism: Compute Fréchet Mean mu; Map points to T_mu M via Log_mu; Compute standard Pearson on tangent vectors.
blueprint.fault_detection: Tangent vector norm > Injectivity Radius (Cut Locus violation)

detailed_mechanisms.normalization: Division by geometric standard deviation (Root Mean Square of geodesic distances)

blueprint.mechanism: Winsorized Pearson: Geodesic Truncation of outliers beyond radius R before covariance computation.

detailed_mechanisms.outlier_identification: Points with d_M(x, mu) > k * sigma

blueprint.mathematical_foundation: Online Welford Algorithm on Riemannian Manifolds
blueprint.mechanism: Incremental update of Mean and M2 statistics using Parallel Transport between steps.
blueprint.fault_detection: Numerical instability in parallel transport (Holonomy error accumulation)

detailed_mechanisms.transport_step: Transport previous M2 tensor to new mean's tangent space
detailed_mechanisms.update_step: Combine transported M2 with new sample contribution

blueprint.mechanism: Rank points based on Geodesic Distance from a reference Origin (or Anchor).
blueprint.fault_detection: Ambiguous ranking due to equidistant points (Measure zero check)

detailed_mechanisms.tie_breaking: Lexicographic ordering using angular coordinates in Tangent Space

blueprint.mechanism: Map points to Voronoi cells of a fixed atlas; Rank based on cell index/weight.

detailed_mechanisms.hashing: Locality Sensitive Hashing (LSH) for fast cell lookup

blueprint.mechanism: Count concordant vs discordant pairs based on geodesic distance ordering.

detailed_mechanisms.pair_evaluation: Sign(d_M(A, B) - d_M(A, C)) * Sign(d_M(A', B') - d_M(A', C'))
detailed_mechanisms.normalization: Adjustment for ties in geodesic distance (Tau-b denominator)
